title: TOXIC PLAYERS WUT IS THIS
body: TOXIC...I just played a game with not very good team mates. But thats not the toxic part, it was the opponent. He played nasus support and he did ok. But the toxic part is when he flamed us the whole game. Like litarelly he Flammed my team form the start to finish just because he was winning. And it also continued after game when he added me and told me to KYS cause i suck and i should uninstall and f**k off. Wut is that... O_O i play league to have fun not to be hared at by an opponent and tell me to Off myself. Riot wut is this. And thats not even wut I'm mad about. He took the god dam piss to add me and to tell me all this stuff and blocked me. O_O wut is this. Im not offended its just Why...Its like shooting a guys thats already dead because he looked ugly. thats Disgusting and u need to fix this.

Things like this are the reason that Riot are giving so many incentives to playing in premade 5man teams. Go find some friends  {either irl or on the [recruitment board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment)) } so you don't have to put up with toxic randoms. 

Also, like Cheesyleeks said, you cant name and shame on the boards. Its against [the rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)
